text:
### SCENE 02 – Morning at Hero’s House  

_Location: Hero home — camera follows Gayatri from downstairs to the entrance._

_Gayatri knocks; Hero is still sleeping 🛏 😴 💤_

**Gayatri:** Rey… Annaya…  

> VOICE (background – Oppo Reno 2 jingle): **General ga naku alarms nacchavandi… natural ga levadam antene istam, anduke roju twaraga 10 ki legustha.**

_Hero opens his eyes, checks phone — **10:20**. Rushes to bathroom, toothbrush foam everywhere. Calls friend._

**Hero:** 5 min lo unta… bike tho ready ga undu…  
**H Friend:** Rey, manaki **sem holidays** ra…  
**Hero:** Oh..!  
**H Friend:** Adhi kadhu gaani—!  

_Cuts the call, throws brush, flops back on bed (foam still in mouth)._

_After some time (**12:13**) Hero comes downstairs for water 💧; mood serious. He winks at Gayatri (Tom-and-Jerry sting) and heads back up. Gayatri follows._

**Gayatri:** Annaya…  
_Hero turns._

**Hero:** Yes…?  
**Gayatri:** Eroju **nee results** ra…  
_Hero slips on the floor._

**Hero:** Oh..! (looks downstairs) Na kosamena mounam paatistunnaru… Subjects yemyna poyaya?  
**Gayatri:** 🤨  
**Hero:** (gasps) Enni pass ayya?  
**Gayatri:** 🤨  
**Hero:** Kaneesam **Drawing** aina…?  
**Gayatri:** Mm-hm… **Ledhu**.  

_Hero gets thoroughly scolded._

> VOICE (background): Ee thitlu kottha em kadhu… kaani ee sari kottha-kottha thitlu vinnanu. But sometimes you need to be shameless in life 😉. Kaani edhi aythe adhi ayyindi ani aa roju open aipoya.

**Hero:** Nenu **director avudhamani** anukuntunna…  

_Hero’s mother drops a vessel._  

**Hero:** Naku **1 year** time kavali. (softly) Passion, aim rendu veru ani… kaani na passion-inka-aim rendu okate…  

_Silence. Father and mother walk away._
